home.headline: Welcome to
home.subline: Discover the job that really suits you with our career orientation test.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose between light and dark mode

services.title: Services
services.description: Solutions to support you in your career

careerMatching.title: Career matching
careerMatching.subtitle: Find your career path in just a few clicks
careerMatching.description: Discover the job that suits you through a simple and personalized journey that analyzes your personality, skills and aspirations to offer you the best professional opportunities.
careerMatching.questionnaireDescription: Click on an emoji to answer the question.
careerMatching.question: Question
careerMatching.reviewDescription: Click on any question to review it.

step1.title: Welcome to your career orientation test
step1.description:
This test can help you discover your interests and how they relate to the world of work. It can give you ideas about which careers might suit you.

When the test begins, click an emoji to answer each question. You can use the Back button anytime to change your answers.

step2.title: How does it work?
step2.description:
The test includes {questions_count} questions about professional activities that some people do as part of their job.

Read each question carefully and choose how you feel about each type of work using the emojis below:

step3.title: Ready to start?
step3.description: Try NOT to think about: - Whether you have enough education or training to do the work. - How much money you would make doing the work. Just focus on this: Would you like or dislike doing the work?

results.title: Results
results.description: Here are the results of your career orientation test.
